room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Breakout Games Richmond is so much fun! We broke out of the Hostage room with a little over 11 mins! Alyssa our Game Master was great! She ensured we had a great time! Can’t wait to do another room!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Made it through the hostage room last night with a group of 8. We had a BLAST with our Breakout Master MARLEY (like the Bob) lol. They have a great staff and will ensure you get your money’s worth. Go now and challenge yourself!!!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: I've done all of the rooms at this location, and even when I lost (only once) I was having a good time. My friends and I did the Hostage room last night and it was probably my favorite. The experience was spectacular especially with our Game Master Sam. He was very helpful and with my crazy group of five, he was very interactive and kept it extremely entertaining. When we were close to getting frustrated, he was quick to come to our aid. With Sam it wad like having a friend on the controls helping us from the outside.I would highly recommend this to anyone over the age of 16! Go with a group as I've always found it more fun doing the rooms with only friends. Though I've been just as successful with a small group and random strangers in the room.Thanks again Breakout (and Sam!)

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Such a fun experience escaping from the hostage room! Andrew was our game expert and he made the entire thing so much fun! His helpful hints led us to escape with only 58 seconds to spare! Check this place out!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: We did hostage, it was well thought out. Clever and loads of fun!!!
